description: We are a Series B startup building a decentralized internet based on middle-out compression technology.

risk_tolerance.privacy_and_security: Zero. We pitch a 'new internet' that respects privacy. A leak destroys our core value proposition.
risk_tolerance.legal_liability: Very Low. We are constantly under threat of litigation from Hooli. We cannot accept IP indemnities that are weak.
risk_tolerance.operational_uptime: Critical. Our Weissman Score depends on low latency. We cannot tolerate slow vendors.

hard_requirements: MUST NOT be a subsidiary of Hooli or Endframe.
MUST support decentralized storage protocols (IPFS/Filecoin compatible).
MUST NOT track user data for advertising purposes.

risk_strategy_context.legal_bandwidth: Low. Our CFO/COO (Jared) handles all legal reviews manually. We need simple, standard contracts.
risk_strategy_context.engineering_bandwidth: Very High. We prefer to build custom encryption wrappers (Gilfoyle's standard) rather than trust vendor security.
risk_strategy_context.financial_budget: Volatile. We are cash-poor but engineering-rich. We prefer Open Source or self-hosted solutions over expensive Enterprise SaaS.
